body:
## New features
* Primary client power on by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/289
* PrimaryClient: Add methods to unlock protective stop and stop the program by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/292
* Make start_ursim.sh support polyscopex by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/294
## Bugfixes
* Do not print a warning when querying the dashboard server for a running program by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/287
* add missing headers by @razr in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/290
* Try catch RTDE setup by @domire8 in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/285

## CI / repo / package
* Set increased timeout in dashboard client test by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/293
* Reduce usage of dashboard client in tests and examples by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/296

## New Contributors
* @razr made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/290
* @domire8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/285

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.8.0...1.9.0

## New features

* instruction_executor: Allow canceling an instruction by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/281
* Remove direct primary and secondary stream from UrDriver by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/283
 
## Bugfixes

* Fix buffer order of acceleration and velocity by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/279

## Documentation

--

## CI / repo / package

* Build on Windows by @vdm-dev in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/229
* instruction_executor: fix movel test by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/280
* Add an explicit CMake option to turn on/off integration tests by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/282
* Configure gcovr to ignore negative hits as errors by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/284
* Remove unused variables by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/288

## New Contributors
* @vdm-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/229

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.7.1...1.8.0

## Bugfixes
* In servo mode always allow targets close to current pose by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/273
* Remove sending an idle command in quintic spline test by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/275
* Fix trajectory result in trajectory forward mode when no trajectory is running by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/276


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1

## New features
* Expose diagnostic error codes by @jessica-chen-ocado in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/225
* Use ExampleRobotWrapper for initialization in all examples by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/265
* Change UrDriver initialization to a config struct by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/264
* Parametrize reconnection time for UrDriver by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/266
* Use colored log output and timestamps in default log handler by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/267

## Bugfixes
* Use joint speed for extrapolation rather than differences by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/254
* RTDEClient: pause and stop in destructor only if running by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/257
* Fix DashboardClient load program from subdir by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/269
* Improve limit check by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/256
* UrDriver: Send program in headless mode after creating trajectory and script_command servers by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/271

## Documentation
* Add more information about acceleration/velocity parametrization in trajectory examples by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/251
* Move setup instructions to ur_client_library by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/248
* Update link to sphinx-doc.org using https by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/247
* docs: Clarify that the motion functions use script functions for execution by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/255
* Doc examples by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/258
* Fix GH edit URL for trajectory_point_interface example by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/259

## CI / repo / package
* Allow clang-format to indent preprocessor directives by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/246
* Urcap based tests by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/252
* Add codecov/test-results-action by @urrsk in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/260
* Fix branch name for integration tests run on push by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/262
* Use coverage flags to distinguish between runs by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/261
* Enable nightly CI jobs by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/263
* Make UrDriver tests run without ctest by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/270

## New Contributors
* @jessica-chen-ocado made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/225

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.6.0...1.7.0

## New features
* Trajectory point velocities by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/241
* Add instruction executor for high-level robot control by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/242

## Bugfixes
* Enable force mode compatibility with various move types by @urrsk in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/230
* Do not throw exception in DashboardClient::sendRequest by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/249

## Documentation
* Updated documentation by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/228
* Update links to dashboard server documentation by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/243

## CI / repo / package
* Add dependabot configuration to update actions by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/231
* Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/233
* Bump actions/setup-python from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/235
* Bump actions/checkout from 1 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/232
* Bump pre-commit/action from 3.0.0 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/236
* Remove the not regarding MIT license by @urrsk in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/237
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 3 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/234
* Update package maintainers by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/238
* Update ci by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/239
* Modernize cmake by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/244


## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/233

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.5.0...1.6.0

## What's Changed

### New features

* Allow resetting the RTDE client by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/218
* Add more arguments to start_ursim.sh by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/220
* Giving force mode parameters as arguments when calling startForceMode by @URJala in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/208
* Adapt RTDE output recipe based on robot response by @remi-siffert-ocado in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/221

### Bugfixes / Improvements
* Added missing RTDE data packages and fixed incorrect names by @remi-siffert-ocado in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/213
* Add missing algorithm include by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/214
* Added family photo to readme by @URJala in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/219
* Tcp socket improvements by @remi-siffert-ocado in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/222
* CI: Fix flaky example runs by @urfeex in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/223

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.4.0...1.5.0

## What's Changed
* [doc] Sphinx doc by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/95
* [doc] Fix syntax in example.rst by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/207
* [tests] Moved reset of speed slider to correct teardown function, so that it … by @URJala in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/206
* Fix clang compilation error (#209) by @remi-siffert-ocado in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/210
* Allow setting the analog output domain @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/211
* Added check to ensure that the targets are reachable within the robot… by @urmahp in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/184

## New Contributors
* @URJala made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/206
* @remi-siffert-ocado made their first contribution in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/210

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.3.7...1.4.0

## What's Changed
* [CI] Update distros for prerelease test by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/202
* [start_ursim] Use a program folder per model by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/201
* [start_ursim] Always check ursim version for compatibility by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/203
* Fix start ursim by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/204


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.3.6...1.3.7

name: v1.3.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Changed spline interpolation to use the last commanded joint velocity… by @urmahp in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/195


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/compare/1.3.5...1.3.6

name: v1.3.5
body:
### New features
* Add support for UR30 in start_ursim.sh by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/193

### Improvements / Bugfixes
* Wait after docker kill to prevent name conflicts by @RobertWilbrandt in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/187
* Remove duplicated entry in clang-format file by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/188
* Add header guard to datatypes.h by @fmauch in https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/pull/189



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst

name: v1.3.4
body:
We are happy to announce a new version of the `ur_client_library`.

### New features
* Added support for UR20 un `start_ursim.sh` script (#179)
* The receive timeout of the URScript part can be configured explicitly and per control mode (#178)
* Make tcp_server retry binding the socket (#176)

For a full changelog, please see https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst

name: v1.3.3
body:
We are happy to announce a new version of the `ur_client_library`.

### New features
* Add support for setting socket max num tries and reconnect timeout (#172)
* Added RTDEClient constructor with vector recipes (#143)

### Improvements / Bugfixes
* Added handling of spline interpolation with end point velocities (#169)
* Throws exception if the URScript file doesn't exists (#173)
* Add separate rounding in the conversion from float to int32

For a full changelog, please see https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst

name: v1.3.2
body:
We are happy to announce a new version of the `ur_client_library`.

### New features
- The URScript file and communication protocol now supports spline interpolation running on the robot (see https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/issues/151)
- Add SaveLog command to the Dashboard client to save the current log output to a log file
- Specifically set RTDE pipeline producer to FIFO scheduling (https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/issues/139)
- Added support for force_mode, freedrive and tool contact (https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/issues/138)

For a full changelog, please see https://github.com/UniversalRobots/Universal_Robots_Client_Library/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst
